lyrics:
29 contributorstranslationsportuguêsitalianotake a bow lyricsverse 1 madonna  babyface

say your lines but do you feel them

no one around
watchin you watchin me one lonely star

chorus madonna babyface both
ive always been in love with you always with you
i guess youve always known its true you know its true
you took my love for granted why oh why

say goodbye byebye
say goodbye

one lonely star you dont know who you are
